title: user authentication including oauth login and jwt token handling
description: Verify that the user authentication flow works correctly including login, registration, JWT token issuance and validation, and OAuth login support for Google and Kakao providers.

title: dashboard displays correct portfolio and trading statistics
description: Ensure the main dashboard correctly displays the user's portfolio overview, balance, and trading statistics reflecting the backend data accurately.

title: bot management create start stop and monitor bots
description: Test the creation, starting, stopping, and monitoring of AI Trend and Grid trading bots, ensuring data persistence and correct bot state transitions.

title: grid bot templates application and backtesting
description: Validate that AI-recommended grid bot templates can be applied by users and backtested with accurate performance results and feedback.

title: admin grid template manager crud and backtesting
description: Verify that admin users can perform create, read, update, delete operations on grid bot templates and run backtests without errors.

title: backtesting engine with candle data and performance metrics
description: Test the backtesting engine for grid trading strategies using historical candle data and ensure performance metrics are calculated and reported correctly.

title: real time trading interface with chart and position management
description: Ensure the real-time trading interface displays live market data via TradingView charts and allows users to open, close, and manage positions correctly.

title: trading history accuracy and analytics
description: Validate that the trading history page shows accurate past trade records and performance analytics matching the recorded trade information.

title: strategy and alert configuration and triggering
description: Test that trading strategy configurations and alert settings are saved correctly and trigger appropriate notifications in response to market events.

title: user settings api key management and preferences
description: Verify that user settings including API key management and preferences are saved and persisted correctly with backend synchronization.
